ctx: intros ns n failed Hnot_in_failed Hin_ns.
exceptions.tactic: apply in_failed_exclude with (ns := ns) (failed := failed) (n := n); auto.
exceptions.exn: In environment base_fst, base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o' fail_fst : FailureParams multi_fst fail_snd : FailureParams multi_snd fail_map_congr : FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd base_map overlay_fst : NameOverlayParams multi_fst overlay_snd : NameOverlayParams multi_snd overlay_map_congr : NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency overlay_fst overlay_snd name_map ns : list name n : name failed : list name Hnot_in_failed : ~ In (tot_map_name_inv n) failed Hin_ns : In (tot_map_name_inv n) ns Unable to unify "~ In (tot_map_name_inv n) failed /\\ In (tot_map_name_inv n) ns" with "In (tot_map_name_inv n) (remove_all name_eq_dec failed ns)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_snd: BaseParams
base_fst: BaseParams
multi_fst: MultiParams base_fst
multi_snd: MultiParams base_snd
base_map: BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd
name_map: MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
msg_map: MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
name_map_bijective: MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map
multi_map_congr: MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map
tot_map_output_injective: forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o'
fail_fst: FailureParams multi_fst
fail_snd: FailureParams multi_snd
fail_map_congr: FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd base_map
overlay_fst: NameOverlayParams multi_fst
overlay_snd: NameOverlayParams multi_snd
overlay_map_congr: NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency overlay_fst overlay_snd name_map

Goal:
forall (ns : list name) (n : name) (failed : list name), ~ In (tot_map_name_inv n) failed -> In (tot_map_name_inv n) ns -> In (tot_map_name_inv n) (remove_all name_eq_dec failed ns)

Premises:
tot_map_name_inv = fun (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) => let (_, tot_map_name_inv) := MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 in tot_map_name_inv : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> name -> name Arguments tot_map_name_inv {B0 B1 P0 P1 MultiParams
tot_map_output = fun (P0 P1 : BaseParams) (BaseParamsTotalMap0 : BaseParamsTotalMap P0 P1) => let (_, _, tot_map_output) := BaseParamsTotalMap0 in tot_map_output : forall P0 P1 : BaseParams, BaseParamsTotalMap P0 P1 -> output -> output Arguments tot_map_output {P0 P1 BaseParamsTotalMap}
Record MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (M : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) : Prop := Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective { tot_map_name_inv_inverse : forall n : name, tot_map_name_inv (tot_map_name n) = n; tot_map_name_inverse_inv : forall n : name, tot_map_name (tot_map_name_inv n) = n } Arguments MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective {B0 B1 P0 P1} Arguments Build
Record NameOverlayParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NameOverlayParams { adjacent_to : Relation_Definitions.relation name; adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}; adjacent_to_symmetric : RelationClasses.Symmetric adjacent_to; adjacent_to_irreflexive : RelationClasses.Irreflexive adjacent_to } Arguments NameOverlayParams {P0} Arguments Build_NameOverlayParams [P0] _ [adjacent_to] _%function_scope
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input ->
output = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, _, output) := BaseParams0 in output : BaseParams -> Type Arguments output {BaseParams}
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> MultiParamsMsgTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), FailureParams P0 -> FailureParams P1 -> BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> Prop
NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), NameOverlayParams P0 -> NameOverlayParams P1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
MultiParamsMsgTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
MultiParamsNameTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
Record BaseParamsTotalMap (P0 P1 : BaseParams) : Type := Build_BaseParamsTotalMap { tot_map_data : data -> data; tot_map_input : input -> input; tot_map_output : output -> output } Arguments Build_BaseParamsTotalMap _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
Record FailureParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailureParams { reboot : data -> data } Arguments FailureParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailureParams [P0] _ _%function_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
remove_all : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> list A -> list A -> list A
in_failed_exclude : forall (ns failed : list name) (n : name), In (tot_map_name_inv n) (remove_all name_eq_dec failed ns) -> ~ In (tot_map_name_inv n) failed /\ In (tot_map_name_inv n) ns
in_adjacent_exclude_in_exlude : forall (ns failed : list name) (n h : name), In (tot_map_name_inv n) (filter_rel adjacent_to_dec h (remove_all name_eq_dec failed ns)) -> In (tot_map_name_inv n) (remove_all name_eq_dec failed ns) /\ adjacent_to h (tot_map_name_inv n)
